title: Research Progress on AI/ML analyses of Police Faces

replies.msg:
I will regularly write my research progress here. So far, I am exploring various options of integrated facial detection/recognition.

In one of the photos I posted, I took two faces of the police officers from the video that captured the stealing incident, and then I compared the two faces to see if they are the same officer. The method I used outputs a probability of 90% match.

Importance: this integrated analyses will allow me to detect which police officers have been involved in suppression of protests. I will then forward these data to foreign intelligence agencies.

Nice project.
And this is for academic discussion and may apply to other subjects

Thanks. I am not living in HK. ;)
